titleStmt.title: The mirrour of mutabilitie, or Principall part of the Mirrour for magistrates Describing the fall of diuers famous princes, and other memorable personages. Selected out of the sacred Scriptures by Antony Munday, and dedicated to the Right Honorable the Earle of Oxenford.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Allde and are to be solde by Richard Ballard, at Saint Magnus Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
